1. [Mayor & Council](https://www.aledotx.gov/mayor-council)

Shane Davis
===========

![Shane Davis](https://www.aledotx.gov/sites/g/files/vyhlif6511/f/styles/news_image/public/people/shane_davis.jpg?itok=QDAGPCAj)

[Contact Shane Davis](https://www.aledotx.gov/user/391/contact)

Phone:

817-441-7016

Shane Davis was elected Mayor of the City of Aledo in May 2025. Prior to becoming mayor, he served on the Aledo City Council, Place 1, beginning May 1, 2021, and was re-elected for a second term in May 2023. He also served as Mayor Pro Tem from May 26, 2022, to July 27, 2023. Before his time on the council, Mr. Davis contributed to the community as a member of the Aledo Parks & Recreation Board from February 2019 to May 2021.
